info: Version 8.24.1 introduces full support for the Veil privacy blockchain and important bug fixes across multiple blockchains.
bugs: Monero Transactions: Fixed patch issue affecting Monero transaction processing.
Fusion Algorand Claiming: Resolved issue with claiming rewards using Algorand addresses.
Transaction Fee Validation: Added fee checks before sending to prevent failed transactions.
Various UI/UX improvements and stability fixes
General Cleanups: Package and copy refinements across the app.
features: Veil Blockchain Support: Complete integration of the Veil privacy-focused blockchain: Native VEIL coin support with full send/receive functionality; Privacy-preserving transaction capabilities; Dedicated Veil API and explorer integration; Support for viewing spend and view keys (public/secret).
Beldex Library: Updated to v2.0.0 to support the latest Beldex network fork.
Login Experience: Improved login sections with refactored token import and notification triggers.
Platform Notifications: Enhanced mobile-friendly notification display.
Solana Logo: Updated to new official branding.
Terra Configuration: Adjusted Terra blockchain settings.
